item.description:
TabTab 2.0.4 - Stability & Polish Update ü™¥

  • Fixed browser tabs incorrectly jumping to the top of the list
  • Smoother animations throughout the app
  • Fixed Firefox vertical tab support
  • Cmd+A and other modifier key combinations now work correctly in the search bar
  • TabTab no longer steals focus from other apps
  • Many smaller bug fixes and improvements!

‚ù§Ô∏è Thank You

Keep your feedback and bug reports coming! I take time to read every single one.

Since TabTab isn't on the App Store, organic comments on subreddits or social media help a lot. Do consider spreading the word about TabTab if you find it useful ü´∂

Feel free to join our Discord community.

Thank you for using TabTab!
